Name: DriftZ
About the game: In a world where drift is your only weapon of defense against Zombie invasion, you have been recruited for your skill. You are the only hope for your community. Following a zombie invasion caused by pharmaceutical giants, you are the defense weapon of your people. Fight on many terrains to repel every enemy. Equipped with your old car, you will start the extermination missions. These will bring you money that you can spend on solidifying and arming your vehicle. You'll also be able to purchase new, more powerful and more robust vehicles to face the increasingly difficult challenges of this unprecedented war. Important point: ➡ 8 cars of war! ➡ Controller supported! ➡ Exclusive maps! ➡ Steam ranking! ➡ Background music! ➡ Addictive! Will you be the first to get through this war? Share your scores and battle photos in the Steam DriftZ community!
Meta Title: DriftZ: Jul 12, 2020, Studio Inward and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on DriftZ? Check out the release date (Jul 12, 2020), developer insights from Studio Inward, and a complete game summary.
